author: minfrin
msg: Add the ldap-search option to mod_authnz_ldap, allowing authorization
to be based on arbitrary expressions that do not include the username.

author: markt
msg: Add new constant missed in previous commit
This is part 7 of 7 of the fix for CVE-2014-0119

author: markt
msg: More defensive coding around some XML activities that are triggered by web applications and are therefore at potential risk of a memory leak.
This is part 6 of 7 of the fix for CVE-2014-0119
